author: fimi.vn
title: Reward for Community Translators
description: Быстро растущий размер сообщества требует, чтобы документы и новости Cardano были представлены в более интересной и понятной форме.

f6_assessments.q0:
It's clear, as specified in the challenge brief, that there is a large portion of the world population that doesn't speak english. This proposal addresses this fact effectively as it wants to provide translations of information about the cardano, to the vietnamite speaking community. The success of this project will definitely have a positive impact on the adoption of cardano. Local communities need to have the information available in their own languages in order for them to fully grasp the concepts vehiculated in these messages. What is not really clear is the reward system the proposer has outlined. Maybe it's a language barrier, but, from what I've understood, they will just pay some people for the translations.
If there's an actual reward system, I think that there are not enough details about it. It's definitely a point that this proposal can be improved on. (Rate given 5)
f6_assessments.q1: The fact that the proposer has done a similar project, gives me enough confidence to believe that the project is feasible.Besides, they have added very detailed information about the team and the budget needed to execute this project. They know exactly the team and profile needed for this project to work. The budget is also broken down into detailed understandable items, and seems pretty reasonable based on my intuition. I can say that the proposer outlined perfectly what they are trying to build and how to do it. This is very important for the feasibility of the project. Furthermore, the proposer has provided a timetable that is reasonable for the completion of the project. To sum it up, the proposer has provided enough details for me to believe that they can execute this project properly without issues. (Rate given 5)
f6_assessments.q2: Based on the amount of informations provided by this proposer, this project can be audited successfully in the future. These informations include a detailed roadmap with reasonable and achievable milestones. They have also provided the metrics needed to measure the success of this project. Furthermore, the problem they are trying to solve is clearly outlined and the solution is also well articulated for us to understand.(Rate given 5)

f6_assessments.q0:
I strongly agree because 
 Scaling up cardano community Hubs,  is one of the major solutions indentified to solve the above problem and falling in scope with the challenge.

 throught this will add Good value to the cardano ecossytem. By rewarding community translators will help entus them to put in much effort because blockchain contain technical words that are very difficult to translate.

Key metrics a nd goals are stated clearly and falls with the scope of the challenge  And also scale up to adress future challenges because it's going to be a contineus training.
f6_assessments.q1:
Strongly agreed.
because the proposer has provide evidence, vedios, reference, links etc of relevant skills and experienced needed to implement the proposal and the links and vedios are  sufficiant and accurate.

The proposer has also listed in numbers the needed team for the implementation of this proposal if funded that is the, Translations being evaluated under the following criteria:
accuracy, timeliness, interesting and virality and it's been break down nicely.

The IS budget is also reasonable to achieve the set goals and also provide realivant time table of completing the proposal if funded by bringing on board more translaters from various backgrounds.

The proposer has considered some challengies and risks relevant to a successful implementation that's not updating enough news every day, not updating daily news in time etc
f6_assessments.q2:
strongly agreed because there are many info's about road maps for chievement if funded.

Good metrics /KPI's describe the problem and understanderble describtions of the targeted problem and reasonable solutions to address it.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal is a great idea. It has a pretty quality summary that provides a complete and easy to understand idea of the group's idea. With a relatively new cryptocurrency market in Vietnam, I believe the idea. This idea is necessary for this market. To be able to access and help newcomers to Cardano in Vietnam can access information, as well as solid knowledge for them. I look forward to your development.
f6_assessments.q1: With the experience that the proposed team has, I believe that you can implement this proposal very well. At the same time, the group has also proven its experience in the past and present. with experience and presentation. such details the project will work well. But I think the team should consider and clarify the criteria for choosing which filter information is correct and necessary for the Vietnamese Cardano community.
f6_assessments.q2: With the milestones and clear roadmap of the proposal, I highly appreciate the above project. At the same time, the proposed team has provided enough information and owns a quality youtube channel, large community groups. .you also provide metrics that determine the success of the proposal. you have a clear and understandable way of describing the problem. I believe you will succeed with this project.

f6_assessments.q0: Translating content from English to foreign languages is extremely necessary because not everyone knows English. This has a long-term impact and fully transmits wealth, at best, promoting the community to have easier access to technology information as well as access to a good environment for early development of blockchain technology into practice.
f6_assessments.q1: I have seen the first results of this project team that has translated many videos from English to Vietnamese. That is proof of the seriousness and enthusiasm of this project of translating and sharing knowledge to this community. This project is practical and urgent.
f6_assessments.q2: Through the number of videos and the number of translated shared content, it is easy to see how the project's KPIs are completed. Pretty easy to check through youtube and the website they shared.

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal is to attract the community to translate Cardano documents into Vietnamese by video. It's a good value project that will solve an immediate need quickly and simply, so it will have a pretty big impact.
The solution is to reward to incentivize the participation of community members in creating good translations and interesting videos. There is clarity in the problem, solution, and relevance of these to the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
There is a good team behind this proposal and it is always an essential part of any chance of a successful implementation. Recommended as Do Manh Hung, he is the leader of Cardano in Vietnam with his experience and knowledge, he has inspired the Vietnamese community to know about Cardano. He is also the founder of the Fimi community, which is the largest Cardano community in Vietnam. You can easily check your information according to what suggestions are provided.
The need and the end goal are very clearly explained as the definition of success. I appreciate the feasibility of this proposal, behind the proposal is a very large community, they seem ready to work together to successfully implement the proposal. Recommend a great plan as well as quality videos they have made available to the community. This demonstrates their passion and faith in Cardano, even if this proposal is not funded, I am confident that they will continue to implement the proposal with their own resources.
The proponent presents a number of potential challenges and risks, and the proponent has solutions to address all of them.
f6_assessments.q2:
A clear roadmap and timeline provides transparent goals for the project to achieve, providing a sufficient means of measuring project success. It is proposed to provide a roadmap with a clear timeline of 3,6,12 months with specific goals
I strongly agree that the proposed success criteria and metrics are well established to measure progress in addressing the challenge.
      A budget of $18,000 was requested and commended for its use. In my assessment, the proposed requirements are modest compared to the proposed workload outlined. With $1.50 for 1 minute of video translation is modest

f6_assessments.q0:
Language always be a big barrier against to developing ideas and delieverying info globally effectively. The reward mechanism as this proposal build that will help to develop the Cardano communities more in the future because it can help not just non-english reader but also with someone know english but hard to understand the specialized words. 
More than that, with the numbers in the KPIs and goals that this proposal set, I think it will drive a lot of new users and inspiring local communities to go with Cardano a lot.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal fullfilled with detail that we can trust that they will make it work: 
- A detailed roadmap inth months with number of production video content for helping communities. 
- Very detail and reasonable budget break down that fit with their roadmap and to help acquire the best results 
- They already done a lot of video by themselve, and that is greatest evidence for what they did and they will do for this project. 
- The information of founder and his motivated community will be great support to help the proposal success 
- It also provide some risks of overloading but I think it will not a big deal and can be fixed by them.
f6_assessments.q2:
I believe in their roadmap and milestone that proposal put because their team did it for years. And all provided info give us full auditability. 
Additionally, even funded or not I think they will keep developing their project because it's on they way, but I hope that this proposal will be funded to help more people aware about Cardano activities for adoption

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal builds a reward mechanism to encourage the participation of community members in creating the best services and interesting videos. This helps a lot to the cardano community in Vietnam who are not fluent in English. will give up the solution of cardano to many people more. according to the plan of the proposed project has a high probability of success.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proponent is someone who has experience in the blockchain field especially the cardano ecosystem. In addition, he also supports coreteam groups specializing in technology research as well as platform projects.
This helps spread knowledge to the community, expanding the number of users of the platform.
development roadmap, budget divided into distinct categories, clear development plan
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal has a clear roadmap, timelines for completing items, and KPIs to check progress. clear, specific and feasible solutions to the problem are given

f6_assessments.q0: Already had a practical impact on the community but but has not really hit the user's demography. The question is why people need access to capture Cardano's project information and not somewhere else. and mechanisms for community translator need certain selectivity and quality.
f6_assessments.q1: The feasibility is quite high due to the needs of translators with good expertise. However, I hope we can build a stable standard for translators, competitive benefits to be able to meet the needs and timely update for customers. a standard system for human resource management. a content standard. That's what makes the community of Cardano
f6_assessments.q2: We all find all metrics very valuable, I wish we could also add real quality key metrics like selectivity and trending rate, audience conversion rate, rate people reach on articles and videos. Team vietnam is really impressive because of the experience gained in recent years, the logical thinking in the media field as well as catching up with the trend.

f6_assessments.q0: The problem statement is presented well. It's true that there is lack of Cardano documents and news be presented in a interesting and understandable way in Vietnamese. Meanwhile, the Vietnamese Catalyst community is growing day by day and this naturally leads to a need for support. The solution is not completely new or creative but I hope that they can do well to improve the problems they have pointed out, which is easy to said than done (make the content more interesting and understandable even with non-tech base people).
f6_assessments.q1: The team has relevant experiance and has good reputation among Vietnamese Catalyst community. Their activities and volunteerily support is now helping many Vietnamese people to "jump on this ship". They proves their enthusiam through it and therefore we can believe that they'll continue their job even more if they're funded. The proposal is also very well-writen, includes all needed parts such as detail plan with milestone, how can they use money etc.
f6_assessments.q2: The KPIs mentioned on the proposal is on point. It includes specific quantity number for each metric, which will help the project easy to track progress and measure success. The output of their activities are also published and very easy to see by any person.

f6_assessments.q0: The problems statement is to the point of the increasingly growing network such as Cardano. The solution is simple yet based on theory of game to incentivize the translator to provide quality work for the community.
f6_assessments.q1: The team member are fullly published profile. They also built local community for 5 years + with hundred of videos and quality content. Moreover, with or without receiving fund the community (I tried to join) is very active and updated frequently about Charles Hoskinson/IHOK media quality content and interesting projects happening on Cardano blockchain. Thus, the proposer is very serious and by getting funded the idea will become even more feasible.
f6_assessments.q2: The KPIs are clearly defined based on minutes and how the team plan to share the rewards to local coordinators. It is also very easy to track on their current YOUTUBE CHANNELs.

solution: Создайте механизм вознаграждения, чтобы поощрять участие членов сообщества в создании лучших переводов и интересных видео.
experience: Переводчик, менеджер сообщества, пионер Plutus, преподаватель блокчейна и криптовалют, тренер по влиятельности
